topics.title: Morning Greeting
topics.audioText: Good morning! How are you today? I hope you slept well. The weather is nice today, isn't it?

topics.title: At the Coffee Shop
topics.audioText: Hello! Welcome to our coffee shop. What would you like to order today? We have coffee, tea, and fresh juice. Would you like something to eat as well?

questions.expectedAnswer: I would like a coffee please

questions.prompt: Say no thank you to food

topics.title: Asking for Directions
topics.audioText: Excuse me, do you need help? The train station is straight ahead. Walk for about five minutes. It's on your left. You can't miss it.

topics.title: Weather Chat
topics.audioText: It's a beautiful day today! The sun is shining and it's not too hot. Do you like this weather? I think it's perfect for a walk in the park.

questions.prompt: Say if you like the weather

topics.title: Simple Introduction
topics.audioText: Hi there! My name is Sarah. I'm from Australia. I work as a teacher. What about you? What's your name and where are you from?

topics.title: Shopping Numbers
topics.audioText: This shirt costs twenty five dollars. We also have pants for thirty dollars. If you buy both, you get a ten percent discount. Would you like to buy anything?

topics.title: At the Restaurant
topics.audioText: Good evening! Table for two? Please follow me. Here's your menu. Today's special is grilled fish with vegetables. Can I get you something to drink while you decide?

topics.title: Phone Number Exchange
topics.audioText: Can I have your phone number? I'll call you tomorrow about the meeting. My number is 0812-3456-7890. What's yours?

topics.title: Time and Schedule
topics.audioText: The meeting starts at nine o'clock in the morning. It will last about one hour. After that, we'll have a short break. Then lunch is at twelve.

topics.title: Family Talk
topics.audioText: I have a big family. I have two brothers and one sister. My parents live nearby. We get together every Sunday for dinner. Do you have any siblings?

topics.title: Airport Announcement
topics.audioText: Attention please. Flight GA 123 to Singapore is now boarding at gate 5. Please have your boarding pass and passport ready. Thank you.

topics.title: Store Closing
topics.audioText: Dear customers, our store will be closing in fifteen minutes. Please bring your items to the checkout counter. Thank you for shopping with us today.

topics.title: Train Delay
topics.audioText: We apologize for the delay. The train to Central Station will arrive in approximately ten minutes. We thank you for your patience.

topics.title: Daily Routine
topics.audioText: Every morning, I wake up at six o'clock. I take a shower and eat breakfast. Then I go to work by bus. I usually arrive at the office at eight. I work until five in the afternoon.

questions.prompt: What time does the person wake up
How do they go to work

topics.title: Hobby Discussion
topics.audioText: In my free time, I like to read books and watch movies. I also enjoy cooking. On weekends, I sometimes play football with my friends. What do you like to do?

topics.title: Hotel Check-in
topics.audioText: Good evening, welcome to the Grand Hotel. Do you have a reservation? I see, the booking is for three nights. Your room is on the fifth floor, room 512. Breakfast is served from 7 to 10 AM. Here's your key card. Do you need help with your luggage?

topics.title: Doctor's Office
topics.audioText: Hello, how can I help you today? I see you've been having headaches. How long has this been going on? About a week? Okay, I'll prescribe some medicine. Take it twice a day, after meals. If it doesn't get better in three days, please come back.

questions.prompt: Ask how to take the medicine

topics.title: Job Interview Basics
topics.audioText: Thank you for coming in today. Please tell me about yourself. What experience do you have? Why are you interested in this position? When would you be able to start if we offered you the job?

questions.expectedAnswer: My name is and I am

topics.title: Booking a Table
topics.audioText: Thank you for calling Milano Restaurant. How can I help you? A reservation? For how many people? And what date and time would you like? Let me check... Yes, we have a table available. May I have your name please?

topics.title: Public Transport
topics.audioText: To get to the museum, take bus number 42 from this stop. It runs every fifteen minutes. Get off at Park Street, the fourth stop. The museum is a five-minute walk from there. Turn right and you'll see it on your left.

topics.title: Making Plans
topics.audioText: What are you doing this weekend? There's a new movie at the cinema. Would you like to watch it together? We could meet at around 3 PM. After the movie, maybe we can grab dinner somewhere?

topics.title: Flight Information
topics.audioText: Ladies and gentlemen, this is your captain speaking. We are currently flying at 35,000 feet. Our estimated arrival time in Tokyo is 3:45 PM local time. The weather in Tokyo is sunny with a temperature of 22 degrees. Thank you for flying with us.

questions.prompt: What is the weather in Tokyo

topics.title: Product Return
topics.audioText: Good morning. I'd like to return this shirt. Oh, what's wrong with it? I see, it's the wrong size. Do you have your receipt? Great. Would you like an exchange or a refund? We can process that for you right away.

topics.title: Gym Tour
topics.audioText: Welcome to our fitness center. Let me show you around. Here's the cardio area with treadmills and bikes. The weight room is over there. We have yoga classes on Mondays and Thursdays at 6 PM. The membership is 50 dollars per month.

topics.title: Birthday Party
topics.audioText: I'm having a birthday party next Saturday at my house. It starts at 7 PM. There will be food, music, and games. Can you come? You can bring a friend if you want. I really hope you can make it!

topics.title: Technology Help
topics.audioText: To connect to the WiFi, go to your settings. Select the network called 'Office WiFi'. Enter the password: capital A, lowercase b, c, 1, 2, 3. Click connect. If it doesn't work, try restarting your device.

topics.title: Apartment Viewing
topics.audioText: This apartment is 60 square meters with two bedrooms. The rent is 800 dollars per month, utilities not included. It comes furnished with basic appliances. There's a security deposit of one month's rent. The lease is for a minimum of one year. Would you like to see the bedrooms?

topics.title: Bank Account
topics.audioText: Good afternoon. I'd like to open a savings account. We have several options. Our basic account has no monthly fee but requires a minimum balance of 500 dollars. The premium account offers higher interest rates but has a 10 dollar monthly fee. What type of account would suit you best?

topics.title: Conference Call
topics.audioText: Good morning everyone. Let's get started with our weekly update. First, I'd like to discuss the progress on the marketing campaign. The deadline is next Friday. Sarah, can you give us an update on your team's progress? Then we'll move on to budget review.

topics.title: Car Rental
topics.audioText: Welcome to Quick Car Rental. What type of vehicle are you looking for? We have economy, midsize, and SUV options. How many days do you need it? I'll also need your driver's license and credit card. Do you want full insurance coverage?

questions.expectedAnswer: What insurance options do you have

topics.title: Project Update
topics.audioText: I wanted to give you an update on the project. We've completed 70 percent of the work. However, we're facing some challenges with the software integration. We might need an additional week to finish. I'd like to propose moving the deadline from March 15th to March 22nd.

topics.title: Restaurant Review
topics.audioText: Last weekend, I tried a new Italian restaurant downtown. The atmosphere was cozy and romantic. I ordered the seafood pasta, which was absolutely delicious. The portion was generous and the price was reasonable - about 25 dollars per person. The service was excellent too. I would definitely recommend it.

questions.expectedAnswer: What is the name of the restaurant

topics.title: Insurance Claim
topics.audioText: I understand you need to file a claim for a damaged laptop. When did the damage occur? Do you have the receipt or proof of purchase? Our policy covers accidental damage up to 2000 dollars. You'll need to fill out this form and provide photos of the damage. Processing usually takes 5-7 business days.

topics.title: University Lecture
topics.audioText: Today we'll be discussing climate change and its impact on agriculture. There are three main points I want to cover. First, rising temperatures. Second, changing rainfall patterns. Third, the adaptation strategies farmers are using. Please take notes as there will be a quiz next week.

questions.prompt: Ask a question about the topic
questions.expectedAnswer: Could you explain more about adaptation strategies

acceptedVariations: The quiz is next week right

topics.title: Travel Agency
topics.audioText: Welcome to Sunshine Travel. Are you looking for a package tour or planning your own itinerary? I see, you're interested in Bali. We have a 5-day tour that includes flights, hotel, and some activities. It's 1500 dollars per person, all inclusive. Would you like more details?

topics.title: News Report
topics.audioText: In today's top story, the government has announced new environmental regulations. Companies will be required to reduce carbon emissions by 30 percent over the next five years. Environmental groups have welcomed the decision, while some business leaders express concerns about the economic impact.

topics.title: Tech Support Call
topics.audioText: Thank you for calling Tech Support. I understand your computer won't start. Have you tried holding the power button for 10 seconds? Still nothing? Let's try disconnecting the power cable, waiting 30 seconds, then reconnecting it. If that doesn't work, it might be a hardware issue.

topics.title: Business Negotiation
topics.audioText: We've reviewed your proposal carefully. While we find the pricing competitive, we'd like to negotiate the payment terms. Our standard practice is 50 percent upfront and 50 percent upon completion. Additionally, we'd like to discuss the timeline. Could you deliver in 8 weeks instead of 12?

acceptedVariations: Let me check with my team
We usually ask for 30 up front

topics.title: Medical Consultation
topics.audioText: Based on your test results, your cholesterol levels are slightly elevated. I'd recommend some lifestyle modifications - reducing saturated fat intake, increasing physical activity, and considering dietary supplements. We should monitor this over the next three months. If there's no improvement, we may need to discuss medication options.

questions.expectedAnswer: What specific changes should I make
What are the potential side effects

topics.title: Investment Advice
topics.audioText: Given your risk tolerance and investment horizon of 20 years, I'd suggest a diversified portfolio. We could allocate 60 percent to equity funds, 30 percent to bonds, and 10 percent to alternative investments. This should give you growth potential while managing volatility. Would you like to review some specific fund options?

topics.title: Legal Consultation
topics.audioText: I've reviewed the contract and identified several concerning clauses. The liability section is particularly one-sided. I'd recommend renegotiating paragraphs 7 and 12. Also, the termination clause should include a 30-day notice period. Without these changes, I wouldn't advise signing.

questions.expectedAnswer: What happens if we sign as is

topics.title: Strategy Presentation
topics.audioText: Our five-year strategic plan focuses on three pillars: digital transformation, market expansion, and operational excellence. We're targeting 20 percent revenue growth annually. Key initiatives include launching an e-commerce platform, entering Southeast Asian markets, and implementing automation across manufacturing.

questions.expectedAnswer: What is the timeline for these initiatives

topics.title: Research Findings
topics.audioText: Our research indicates a strong correlation between employee engagement and productivity. Teams with high engagement scores showed 21 percent higher profitability. Key drivers include meaningful work, recognition, and growth opportunities. We recommend implementing quarterly feedback sessions and a mentorship program.

questions.expectedAnswer: How should we implement these recommendations

topics.title: Crisis Management
topics.audioText: We need to address this situation immediately. The product recall affects approximately 50,000 units. Our priority is customer safety, followed by transparent communication. I've prepared a press statement. We should also set up a dedicated hotline and update our website with recall information.

questions.expectedAnswer: We should also notify regulatory authorities
What compensation will we offer customers

topics.title: Merger Discussion
topics.audioText: The proposed merger would create significant synergies. We estimate cost savings of 50 million dollars annually through consolidation. However, cultural integration is a key risk factor. We'd need to carefully manage the transition to retain key talent. Due diligence will take approximately three months.

questions.expectedAnswer: What are the next steps in the process

topics.title: Academic Defense
topics.audioText: Your thesis presents an interesting hypothesis. However, I have concerns about the sample size in your quantitative analysis. Could you elaborate on why you chose 50 participants? Additionally, the literature review seems to overlook some recent publications in this field from 2025.

questions.expectedAnswer: The sample size was limited due to resource constraints but statistically significant
I will review and incorporate the recent publications

topics.title: Environmental Assessment
topics.audioText: The environmental impact assessment reveals several concerns. The proposed development would affect a wetland ecosystem. We've identified three endangered species in the area. Mitigation measures must include a buffer zone of at least 200 meters and water quality monitoring. Construction timing should avoid breeding seasons.

questions.expectedAnswer: How will this affect the project timeline

topics.title: Diplomatic Briefing
topics.audioText: The trade negotiations have reached a critical phase. Both parties have agreed on tariff reductions for manufactured goods. However, agricultural subsidies remain contentious. The next round of talks is scheduled for next month in Geneva. We anticipate a framework agreement by year end if progress continues.

questions.expectedAnswer: What are the main sticking points
What is the best case scenario

topics.title: Cybersecurity Incident
topics.audioText: We've detected a security breach affecting customer data. Approximately 10,000 accounts may be compromised. Our forensic team has contained the intrusion. We're required by law to notify affected customers within 72 hours. I recommend engaging a third-party security firm for independent assessment.

questions.prompt: Ask about the type of data
questions.expectedAnswer: What type of data was compromised
We should implement additional security measures

topics.title: Economic Forecast
topics.audioText: The central bank has revised its growth forecast downward to 2.5 percent for this year. Inflation is expected to moderate to 3 percent by Q4. Interest rates will likely remain stable through June but could increase in the second half if inflationary pressures persist. Consumer spending remains resilient.

questions.expectedAnswer: What does this mean for businesses

topics.title: Grocery Shopping
topics.audioText: Can I help you find something? The fruits and vegetables are in aisle three. The dairy products are at the back of the store. We have a special offer on rice this week - buy two, get one free.

topics.title: Lost and Found
topics.audioText: I found this wallet near the entrance. Does it belong to you? There's an ID card inside with the name John Smith. If it's yours, can you describe what else is inside?

questions.prompt: Respond if it's yours or not

topics.title: Cooking Instructions
topics.audioText: To make fried rice, first heat oil in a pan. Add garlic and stir for one minute. Then add the rice and mix well. Push the rice to the side and scramble an egg. Finally, add soy sauce and vegetables. Stir everything together for two minutes.

questions.prompt: Ask what to add after the garlic
questions.expectedAnswer: What do I add after the garlic
How long should I cook it

topics.title: Fitness Class
topics.audioText: Welcome to spinning class! We'll start with a five-minute warm-up. Then we'll increase the resistance for 20 minutes. After that, there's a cool-down period. Remember to stay hydrated. If you feel dizzy, please slow down.

questions.expectedAnswer: Can I take a water break

topics.title: Museum Audio Guide
topics.audioText: You are now viewing 'The Starry Night' by Vincent van Gogh. Painted in 1889, this masterpiece shows a swirling night sky over a village. Van Gogh created this while staying at a mental asylum. Notice the bright colors and thick brushstrokes that make his style unique.

topics.title: Sports Commentary
topics.audioText: Welcome back to the football match! The score is 2-1. There are 15 minutes left in the game. The home team is attacking. Number 10 has the ball. He passes to number 7. Great shot! But it hits the post! So close!

topics.title: Emergency Instructions
topics.audioText: In case of fire, remain calm and follow these instructions. Locate the nearest exit - they are marked with green signs. Do not use elevators. Cover your nose and mouth if there's smoke. Meet at the designated assembly point in the parking lot.

topics.title: Customer Service Call
topics.audioText: Thank you for calling. Your call is important to us. I can see your order was placed on January 3rd. It shows the package was delivered on January 6th. You didn't receive it? I'm sorry to hear that. Let me file a claim and arrange a replacement. You should receive it within 3-5 business days.

questions.expectedAnswer: Yes I didn't receive my package
Can you track the original package

topics.title: Workshop Feedback
topics.audioText: Thank you for attending today's workshop. Before you leave, we'd appreciate your feedback. What did you find most useful? Were there any topics you'd like us to cover in more depth? We're planning another workshop next month on advanced techniques.

questions.expectedAnswer: I found the practical examples very helpful
I'd like to learn more about

topics.title: Podcast Interview
topics.audioText: Today I'm talking with Sarah, a successful entrepreneur. Sarah, you started your business with just 1000 dollars. Now it's worth millions. What was your secret? Well, I focused on solving a real problem. I listened to customers and kept improving. The key is persistence and being willing to learn from failures.

topics.title: Government Service
topics.audioText: Welcome to the passport office. Do you have an appointment? I'll need your current passport, two recent photos, and the completed application form. The processing fee is 150 dollars. Regular processing takes 4-6 weeks. Expedited service is available for an additional 60 dollars.

questions.expectedAnswer: What payment methods do you accept

topics.title: Property Viewing
topics.audioText: This property was built in 2020 and features energy-efficient design. The solar panels generate approximately 80 percent of the electricity needs. The property includes 3 bedrooms, 2.5 bathrooms, and an office space. The HOA fee covers landscaping, pool maintenance, and exterior repairs. Property taxes are approximately 8000 dollars annually.

questions.expectedAnswer: What are the total monthly costs

topics.title: Board Meeting
topics.audioText: Moving to item 5 on the agenda - capital expenditure. The CFO has proposed a 2 million dollar investment in new manufacturing equipment. This would increase production capacity by 40 percent. The payback period is estimated at 3 years. The finance committee recommends approval. Are there any questions before we vote?

questions.expectedAnswer: What is the expected return on investment

topics.title: Scientific Presentation
topics.audioText: Our research demonstrates a 35 percent improvement in battery efficiency using the new graphene composite. The testing was conducted over 500 charge cycles. The results were statistically significant with a p-value of 0.001. Commercial applications could include electric vehicles and portable electronics. Patent applications are pending.

questions.expectedAnswer: When could this reach the market
What are the limitations of this technology

topics.title: Regulatory Briefing
topics.audioText: The new data privacy regulations take effect March 1st. Key requirements include explicit consent for data collection, 30-day data deletion requests, and mandatory breach notification within 48 hours. Non-compliance penalties can reach 4 percent of annual revenue. We recommend completing a compliance audit by February 15th.

questions.expectedAnswer: How do we conduct the compliance audit

topics.title: Supply Chain Update
topics.audioText: Global shipping disruptions continue to affect our supply chain. Lead times have increased from 4 to 8 weeks. We've identified two alternative suppliers in Vietnam. The transition would take 3 months but could reduce costs by 15 percent long-term. We need to balance short-term stability with strategic sourcing.

questions.prompt: Ask about risks of switching suppliers
questions.expectedAnswer: What are the risks of switching suppliers

topics.title: Health Policy Discussion
topics.audioText: The healthcare reform bill includes several key provisions. Insurance coverage will expand to include mental health services. Prescription drug prices will be negotiated annually. Healthcare providers will receive incentives for preventive care. Critics argue the funding mechanism is unsustainable. Supporters cite improved public health outcomes.

questions.expectedAnswer: When will these changes take effect
What is the cost to implement this

topics.title: Venture Capital Pitch
topics.audioText: We're seeking 5 million dollars in Series A funding for a 20 percent equity stake. Our platform has 100,000 active users with 25 percent month-over-month growth. Current monthly revenue is 200,000 dollars. We project profitability within 18 months. Funds will be allocated to product development and market expansion.

questions.expectedAnswer: How did you arrive at that valuation

topics.title: Cultural Exchange
topics.audioText: Living abroad taught me valuable lessons about cultural differences. In Japan, I learned the importance of harmony and indirect communication. In Brazil, I experienced the warmth of personal relationships in business. These experiences shaped my approach to international negotiations. Understanding cultural context is often more important than language fluency.

questions.expectedAnswer: What was the biggest cultural challenge
What advice do you have for someone going abroad

topics.title: Sustainability Report
topics.audioText: Our sustainability targets for 2030 include carbon neutrality, zero waste to landfill, and 100 percent renewable energy. We've reduced emissions by 40 percent since 2020. Supply chain emissions remain our biggest challenge, accounting for 70 percent of our footprint. We're implementing supplier engagement programs and exploring carbon offset projects.

questions.expectedAnswer: How do you measure carbon emissions
How do you ensure accountability for these targets
